KhaosStatusEnabled.label: Enable Khaos Status
KhaosStatusEnabled.tooltip: Command will be enabled for usage.

KhaosStatusCost.label: Cost
KhaosStatusCost.tooltip: Command cannot scale price above this value.

KhaosStatusMaxCost.tooltip: Command cannot scale price above this value.

KhaosStatusStartsOnCooldown.label: Starts on cooldown
KhaosStatusStartsOnCooldown.tooltip: Command will be put on cooldown when Khaos is started.

KhaosStatusCooldown.label: Cooldown (minutes)
KhaosStatusCooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for

KhaosStatusUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown (minutes)
KhaosStatusUserCooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for
